name: Froggo and the Mysterious Well
description:
Froggo has fallen into a deep, mysterious well filling with mushrooms and spiders. If he wants to get back to the surface, he must climb his way out by hopping between mushrooms and avoiding obstacles.

controls:

Z key - Jump / Proceed(Menu)

X key - Spit tongue (to grab the grappling points)

Arrow keys - Movements

Warning: Very hard and difficult
